Name: Moirs
About the game: 《About》 《Moirs》is a 7 Keys rhythm game, step into the world of music and enjoy the journey! 《Features》 3+4 Keys, Sky notes and Ground notes test your hand-eye coordination. 7 original songs with their respective, elaborate background visuals. 4 kinds of difficulty, having a relaxing or challenging game play. As songs unlock, the story of a girl chasing her music dream unfolds, and your game play decides the ending. Development diary and mini-game with lots of memes (?)
